text: establishment of local land use boards membership amend rsa i to read as follows any local legislative body may establish a planning board the members of which shall be residents of the municipality new paragraph establishment of local land use boards membership amend rsa by inserting after paragraph v the following new paragraph voting members of any local land use board established pursuant to paragraphs i ii or iv and of a building code board of appeals established pursuant to paragraph v including ex officio members shall be residents of the municipality in which they serve
